description: Erection of two-storey side extension following replacement of existing single-storey side extension, and extension to rear bay at first floor level.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 

Location Plan 28-Mar-2025, Existing GF Plan 1218 - Briardale Gardens - EP-001, Existing FF Plan 1218 - Briardale Gardens - EP-002 Rev A, Existing SF Plan 1218 - Briardale Gardens - EP-003, Existing Roof Plan 1218 - Briardale Gardens - EP-004 Rev A, Existing Front Elevation 1218 - Briardale Gardens - EE-001, Existing Rear Elevation 1218 - Briardale Gardens - EE-002, Existing Side Elevation 1218 - Briardale Gardens - EE-003, Proposed GF Plan1218 - Briardale Gardens -  AP-001, Proposed FF Plan 1218 - Briardale Gardens - AP-002, Proposed SF Plan 1218 - Briardale Gardens - AP-003 Rev A, Proposed Roof Plan 1218 - Briardale Gardens - AP-004 Rev A, Proposed Front Elevation 1218 - Briardale Gardens - AE-001, Proposed Rear Elevation 1218 - Briardale Gardens - AE-002, Proposed Side Elevation 1218 - Briardale Gardens - AE-003 Rev A, Proposed Cross Section 1218 - Briardale Gardens - AS-001, Design and Access Statement Nicholas Lee Architects March 2025.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - All new external work shall be carried out in materials that resemble, as closely as possible, in colour and texture those of the existing building, unless otherwise specified in the approved application. 

Reason: To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017 and policies SD2, SD4 SD5 and SD6 of the Redington Frognal Neighbourhood Plan.
Condition : 4 - Before the relevant part of the work is begun, detailed drawings, or samples of materials as appropriate, in respect of the following, shall be submitted to and approved in writing by the local planning authority:


a) Details including sections at 1:10 of all windows including the rear first-floor bay window (including jambs, head and cill), and joinery.


b) Manufacturer's specification details of all facing materials including brickwork and roof tiles to match existing (to be submitted to the Local Planning Authority) and samples of those materials to view on-site.
 


The relevant part of the works shall be carried out in accordance with the details thus approved and all approved samples shall be retained on site during the course of the works.
 


Reason:  To safeguard the appearance of the premises and the character of the immediate area in accordance with the requirements of policy D1 and D2 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017 and policies SD2, SD4 SD5 and SD6 of the Redington Frognal Neighbourhood Plan.
